ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: Well - too bad the poster isn t just a troll (notice the lower-case t - no slight intend to the capital-T race on EQ (: ) I would be interested in hearing the
ygData.messageBody:
Well - too bad the poster isn't just a troll (notice the lower-case t - no
slight intend to the capital-T race on EQ (: )

I would be interested in hearing the opinions of someone who truly likes the
game better than EQ and why.. There are certainly some neat things in it.
I did try it early in the phase of the Closed Beta they invited me to - and
was thoroughly unimpressed...

Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: Justin Howard <mhoward1@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 3:42 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


> From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>
>
> heh ya right.. in AC all the dungeons look the same!
>
> <laughs!> damn great replay value there.. heh AC is like online
> daggerfall... BIG WORLD... nothing much to it... everything looks the same
> after a while...
>
> GO BACK TO AC!
>
> The Streak(er)

lose
> some
